topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549ba41e63687209bc5c1f00#post_549ba41e63687209bc5c1f00
It was a short called Maintenence Required. About two robots based off of Laurel and Hardy. I did the keyframes and some of the more detailed animation of a beginning scene and a scene where the two robots, after the thin one tries to lift up the fat one, fall to the floor.

It was fun.
